## ResultBaseParams type

Parameters that can be passed into the `ResultBase` class's constructor to initialize an object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ResultBaseParams<TReturned = any> = (Event | {
    message: string;
    type: string;
} | {
    message?: string;
    type: "SUCCESS";
} | {
    message: string;
    severity: string;
} | {
    message?: string;
    severity: 0;
}) & {
    data?: TReturned;
};
```
